validationErrors.endDateLarge: End date cannot be set before start date

buzzListing.title: SEE WHATâ€™S MOVING THE ART WORLD

mainSection.heading: How to write an article
mainSection.firstPara: Think of yourself as a journalist or opinion writer. Write about something of interest for the art world and art lovers. Rather than an opportunity to promote yourself or your own artwork, your article is a space to write about a topic that will interest the general audience.
mainSection.secondPara: You need to have a fully completed profile on ARTMO before you can publish an article.
mainSection.thirdPara: After publishing, you will be recognized as a publisher.

buzzSubSection.heading: Buzz:
buzzSubSection.firstPara: Write an article about a topic of interest for ARTMO users. See great examples for Buzz articles

potdSubSection.heading: Picture of the day | POTD:
potdSubSection.firstPara: Use a POTD category when you have a captivating and fascinating photo you want to write about. Use that image as the feature image and then tell the world the story of that photo. Your POTD will be published

exhibitionSubSection.heading: Exhibition:
exhibitionSubSection.firstPara: Use this category if you are operating a gallery or organizing an exhibition. Write about the exhibition you are organizing and your article will be seen in the Exhibition category.
exhibitionSubSection.secondPara: Your exhibition article will be published
